dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.customer.billing.AppliedCustomerBillingRate
dataStructure.description:
A charge or a credit assigned to the customer's account in the course or for the purpose of the billing process. Subclasses further define these elements.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: AppliedCustomerBillingRate

child.name: date
child.description:
A date of creation.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: date

child.name: quantity
child.description:
A unit (for example, US Dollars) and number of the applied rate.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: quantity

child.name: description
child.description:
A textual description.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: description
